exits.Spirit Temple First Child Room:
(is_child or (is_adult and (can_mega or (glitch_unk_spirit_crawl_hover_boots and Hover_Boots))) and
                transition('Spirit Temple T30', True)
exits.Spirit Temple Lobby East:
(is_adult and 'Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block') or
                (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)
exits.Spirit Temple Shortcut Room South: is_adult and 'Spirit Temple Elevator' and transition('Spirit Temple T32', True)

events.Spirit Temple Room 00 Crystal Switch:
can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or has_bombchus or (Bombs and logic_spirit_lower_adult_switch)
                or can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang)

exits.Spirit Temple Lobby: is_adult and 'Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block'
exits.Spirit Temple Rolling Boulder Room:
transition('Spirit Temple T05', 'Spirit Temple Room 00 Crystal Switch' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 00 T05 Unbar')
exits.Spirit Temple Sandy Lullaby Room:
transition('Spirit Temple T06', 'Spirit Temple Room 00 Crystal Switch' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 00 T06 Unbar')

exits.Spirit Temple Lobby: is_child and transition('Spirit Temple T30', True)
exits.Spirit Temple Cage Crossing Room Front:
transition('Spirit Temple T12', 'Spirit Temple Room 01 Enemies' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 01 T12 Unbar')
exits.Spirit Temple Crystal Bridge Room Front:
transition('Spirit Temple T11', 'Spirit Temple Room 01 Enemies' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 01 T11 Unbar')
exits.Spirit Temple First Child Room Rear: is_child or (can_weirdshot and Longshot) or (glitch_unk_spirit_crawl_hover_boots_2 and can_use(Hover_Boots))

region_name: Spirit Temple First Child Room Rear
Spirit Temple Cage Crossing Room Front

events.Spirit Temple Room 02 Torches: has_fire_source or ('Spirit Temple Room 02 Silver Rupees' and can_use(Sticks))

region_name: Spirit Temple Crystal Bridge Room Front

events.Spirit Temple Room 03 Bridge:
can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Bow) or
                (has_bombchus and logic_spirit_child_bombchu)

exits.Spirit Temple Crystal Bridge Room:
'Spirit Temple Room 03 Bridge' or
                can_use(Longshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega

region_name: Spirit Temple Child Enemy Pit Room West

exits.Spirit Temple Crystal Bridge Room:
transition('Spirit Temple T27', 'Spirit Temple Room 27 Enemies' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 27 T27 Unbar')

region_name: Spirit Temple Child Enemy Pit Room

exits.Spirit Temple Cage Crossing Room:
transition('Spirit Temple T28', 'Spirit Temple Room 27 Enemies' or
                'Spirit Temple Room 27 T28 Unbar'

events.Spirit Temple Room 04 Crystal Switch:
#If not for key logic, would just be can_use_projectile.
            #Can hit switch at either age:
                has_projectile(both) or
            #Can enter room from hands and hit switch with no more than 1 key:
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover) and
                at('Spirit Temple Central Chamber', can_use_projectile)) or
            #Enter room as adult through the heavy block route:
                (((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or 
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)) and
                has_projectile(adult)) or
            #All keys collected so can hit switch without softlock:
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and is_child and 
                    has_projectile(child))

locations.Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room:
#If not for key logic, would just need projectile, Din's Fire, or self-damaging jumpslash.
            #Kill skulltula as either age:
                can_use(Dins_Fire) or has_projectile(both) or 
            #Can enter room from hands and kill skulltula with no more than 1 key:
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover) and
                (at('Spirit Temple Central Chamber', (can_use_projectile or
                    ((can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)) and is_adult))))) or
            #Kill skulltula as child while taking damage:
                ((can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)) and 
                    (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or has_projectile(child))) or
            #If all keys collected, can kill skulltula as child without softlock:
                (is_child and 
                    (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and has_projectile(child)) or
            #Kill skulltula as adult after reaching central chamber through adult path:
                (((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or 
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)) and
                (has_projectile(adult) or damage_multiplier != 'ohko' or 
                    Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber:
transition('Spirit Temple T25', 
                has_explosives or (mm_light_arrows and can_use(Light_Arrows))
                or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar')

locations.Spirit Temple Map Chest:
#Can enter room from hands and light torches, bypassing key logic:
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover) and
                (has_fire_source_with_torch or (logic_spirit_map_chest and can_use(Bow)))) or
            #Light torches as either child or adult:
                ((has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar' or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                        (((Magic_Meter and Fire_Arrows) or logic_spirit_map_chest) and Bow and Sticks))) or 
            #Enter through child path and light torches with only sticks:
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and (has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar') and 
                    can_use(Sticks)) or
            #Enter through adult path and light torches:
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or (logic_spirit_map_chest and Bow)) and 
                    ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                        (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                        (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)))
locations.Spirit Temple GS Lobby:
#Obtainable from various regions, here with longshot from ground. 
                can_use(Longshot) and (shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover or
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and
                    ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)))

exits.Spirit Temple Western 3F Corridor: transition('Spirit Temple T26', True or 'Spirit Temple Room 05 T26 Unbar')
exits.Spirit Temple Shortcut Room:
transition('Spirit Temple T24', 'Spirit Temple Room 05 Rusted Switch'
                or 'Spirit Temple Room 05 T24 Unbar')
exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber Northwest: can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Scarecrow) or can_mega or can_hover or can_climb(480)
exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber Hanging Pl: 'Spirit Temple Room 25 Sun Switch' and can_use(Longshot)

region_name: Spirit Temple Central Chamber Northwest Ledge

locations.Spirit Temple GS Lobby:
#Bypass key logic by entering from hands
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover) and (is_adult or can_child_attack)) or
            #Both ages
                ((has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar' or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                    (is_adult and here(can_child_attack))) or
            #Child
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and (has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar') and can_child_attack) or
            #Adult
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and is_adult and
                    ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and can_shield)))

exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber Hanging Pl: 'Spirit Temple Room 25 Sun Switch' and can_use(Longshot)

region_name: Spirit Temple Central Chamber Right Arm

locations.Spirit Temple GS Lobby:
#Bypass key logic by entering through hands
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover)
                    and (can_use(Hookshot) or (logic_spirit_lobby_gs and can_use(Boomerang)))) or
            #Both ages
                ((has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar' or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                    logic_spirit_lobby_gs and Boomerang and Progressive_Hookshot) or
            #Child
                (logic_spirit_lobby_gs and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and (has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar') and can_use(Boomerang)) or
            #Adult
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and can_use(Hookshot) and
                    ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)))

exits.Spirit Temple Central Chamber Hanging Pl: 'Spirit Temple Room 25 Sun Switch' and can_use(Hookshot)

locations.Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest:
#Can enter room from hands and light torches, bypassing key logic:
                ((shuffle_spirit_hands or can_hover) and
                (has_fire_source_with_torch or (logic_spirit_sun_chest and can_use(Bow)))) or
            #Light torches as either child or adult:
                ((has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar' or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)) and 
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                        (((Magic_Meter and Fire_Arrows) or logic_spirit_sun_chest) and Bow and Sticks))) or 
            #Enter through child path and light torches with only sticks:
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and (has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar') and 
                    can_use(Sticks)) or
            #Enter through adult path and light torches:
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and
                    (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or (logic_spirit_sun_chest and Bow)) and 
                    ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                        (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                        (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)))

locations.Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Ro:
#Bypass key logic by entering through hands (hovering also lets you use the bombs to get it)
                (can_hover or (shuffle_spirit_hands and (can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Hookshot)))) or
            #Both ages
                ((has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar') and
                    Boomerang and Progressive_Hookshot) or 
            #Child
                (can_use(Boomerang) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and
                    (has_explosives or 'Spirit Temple Room 04 T25 Unbar')) or 
            #Adult    
                (can_use(Hookshot) and ('Spirit Temple Room 00 Heavy Block' or
                    (glitch_spirit_block_hover_boots_skip and can_use(Hover_Boots)) or
                    (glitch_unk_spirit_block_adult_shield_skip and is_adult and can_shield)) and 
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or 
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and Boomerang and bombchus_in_logic and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances)))
